org.beanfabrics.swing.table
Class BnColumnBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.beanfabrics.swing.table.BnColumnBuilder

public class BnColumnBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

DSL-sytle Builder for BnColumn objects.

Use it like this:

BnColumn[] columns = new BnColumnBuilder() .addColumn().withPath("this.name").withName("Name") .addColumn().withPath("this.phone").withName("Phone").withWidth(100).withWidthFixed(true).build();

Author:
Michael Karneim
